name: Acropod
description:
My Entry for GBJAM 5, in Acropod you play as a tiny cephalopod with big dreams to do whatever it is you do in this game. Climb stuff! Carry Objects! Activate Mechanisms! Pull Your Own Arms Off To Reassemble Them Into A Mega Arm! Physics! Have Fun!

Controls:

WASD, IJKL, or ARROW KEYS to move
1, 2, 3 to select a tentacle
MOUSE to control your selected tentacle
LEFT MOUSE to grab stuff
RIGHT MOUSE to grab nodes on your other arms and merge them onto your current arm (yeah it's weird I know)

P to cycle the Palette
R to reset the level
ESCAPE to close the game

One final note, the darker palette comes from Led's squid puzzler Abyssal Zone, which just recently got greenlit, and which has a playable demo.
